description: This course will give learners the skills necessary to read the Bible with understanding so the reading is rewarding and leads to personal growth. Short videos with hands-on examples will help students begin the habit of daily Bible reading with journaling. Students will gain practical methods they can apply immediately. Included with this course is a guided, 24-day reading challenge. Students should take this course if they have never read the Bible, or have been frustrated by the inability to make Bible reading a daily habit.
title: Bible Virtuosity
